Title: DjVu: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code
Synopsis:
A vulnerability in DjVu could result in execution of arbitrary code
    or Denial of Service.

Background.Text: DjVu is a web-centric format and software platform for distributing documents and images.

Description.Text: A vulnerability has been discovered in DjVu. Please review the CVE identifier referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted DjVu file, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All DjVu users should upgrade to the latest version:
